title: Asymptotics of dynamic ASEP using duality
abstract:
Using a recently developed method for proving asymptotics via orthogonal
polynomial duality arXiv:2305.17602, we prove that the dynamic ASEP introduced
in arXiv:1701.05239 has asymptotics which are either distributed as the
Tracy--Widom \(F_2,\) or are almost surely bounded. Using a different duality,
we also provide contour integrals formulas for multi--species ASEP, which
generalize results for the single--species ASEP.
